name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Neko Anime Girl In The Rain Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embrace the peaceful beauty of a rainy day with a cute neko anime girl in this stunning live wallpaper for your new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This enchanting live wallpaper features an adorable neko anime girl, with cat ears and a gentle smile, standing in the rain. Watch as raindrops fall softly around her, creating a calm and serene atmosphere. Her umbrella shields her from the gentle downpour, while the soft glow of city lights or moonlight reflects off the wet ground, adding a magical touch to the scene.

Customize the experience with subtle animations like raindrops gently splashing, wind effects, and soothing background sounds of rainfall. Whether you're a fan of anime, cats, or simply love the calm vibes of a rainy day, this extension brings an immersive and peaceful moment to your browsing experience. Let the soothing atmosphere of the neko anime girl in the rain brighten your screen every time you open a new tab!
